name: aliasvault
description: AliasVault is a privacy tool that generates and manages email aliases to protect your real address. It supports disposable inboxes, SMTP forwarding, passwordless access and can be self-hosted for complete privacy control.

features.title: Email Aliases
features.description: Generate unlimited aliases to protect your real address. Shield your identity

features.title: Passwordless Access
features.description: Secure authentication without traditional passwords. Simplified security

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run on your own infrastructure for maximum privacy. Complete data ownership

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Organize and control all your email aliases from one dashboard. Centralized control

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep your real email hidden from websites and services. Stop tracking

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage aliases on the go with native mobile application. Privacy in your pocket
